sample_emails.subject: Login Issues - Cannot Access Dashboard
sample_emails.body:
Hi Support Team,

I'm having trouble logging into my account. When I try to access the dashboard, I get an error message saying 'Invalid credentials' even though I'm sure my password is correct.

Can you please help me resolve this issue?

Best regards,
John Doe
Discount Pipe & Steel

sample_emails.subject: Password Reset Request
sample_emails.body:
Hello,

I forgot my password and need to reset it. I tried using the 'Forgot Password' link but I'm not receiving the reset email.

My username is: jane.smith@client.com

Please assist.

Thanks,
Jane Smith

sample_emails.subject: Account Verification Needed
sample_emails.body:
Dear Support,

I just signed up for a new account but haven't received the verification email. Could you please resend it or manually verify my account?

Email: mike.johnson@startup.io
Sign-up date: Today

Thank you!

sample_emails.subject: System Access Problem - Urgent
sample_emails.body:
URGENT: Multiple users in our organization are unable to access the system. We're getting 500 errors when trying to load any page.

This is affecting our entire team of 50+ users.

Please prioritize this issue.

Contact: admin@enterprise.corp
Phone: +1-555-0123

sample_emails.subject: Feature Request - Export Functionality
sample_emails.body:
Hi there,

I would like to request a new feature: the ability to export project data to CSV format. This would be very helpful for reporting purposes.

Is this something that could be considered for a future release?

Best,
Sarah Wilson

sample_emails.subject: Testing
sample_emails.body:
This is a test email for the ticket dragger system. This email subject matches the default ticket title used in the script.

Test details:
- Default ticket title: 'Testing'
- This should be found in the Resolved section
- Should be moved to Tickets section

End of test email.

From: Discount Pipe & Steel

test_scenarios.command: node eoxs_ticket_dragger.js 'Login Issues - Cannot Access Dashboard'
test_scenarios.description: Passes ticket title as command line argument
